loans.name: Mujeres Unidas Group

texts.es:
La señora Eufemia es de estado civil casada, tiene 34 años de edad, de escolaridad 6to. primaria, tiene 3 hijos y de llos 2 estan estudiando, se dedica a atender su tienda de artículos de consumo diario, inició este negocio con un capital pequeño que le concedió su esposo y hasta la fecha lleva 8 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica al comercio.

Organiza un grupo y decide solicitar un préstamo que lo utilizará para la compra de artículos tales como: azucar, granos básicos, embutidos, pastas, detergente, papel higiénico, gaseosas, entre otros, espera en el futuro tener una abarroteria. Los demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a tienda, venta de ropa y crianza de animales domésticos.
texts.en:
Eufemia is 34, married, and has a grade six education. She has three children, two of whom are in school. She runs a store where she sells basic household goods. She started this business with a small amount of capital that her husband gave her, and currently has 8 years' experience. She counts on her husband's support; he is a merchant.
She has organized this group and decided to request a loan which will be used to buy products such as: sugar, basic staples, canned goods, pasta, detergent, toilet paper, and pop. In the future, she hopes to have a grocery store.
The other group members have stores, sell clothing, and raise domestic animals.

loans.use: to buy household products.

loans.name: Astrid

texts.es: Astrid, de 21 años, está casada y tiene una hija pequeña con quien vive en la casa de su suegra. Astrid se dedica a la confección de ropa, muchas veces espera que el cliente la visiten y le pidan un diseño o la refacción de alguna prenda, en otras ocasiones ella misma se inspira en nuevos diseños y crea su propia ropa para luego venderlos entre sus clientes, familiares y amigos. Su taller esta ubicado en la casa de su suegra en donde acondicionó un lugar para trabajar tranquila. Lleva realizando este negocio por 2 años y con el tiempo aprendió a darle un buen acabado a su trabajo. Paralelamente vende gaseosas y helados. Le gusta lo que hace pues se siente una mujer independiente, tiene su propio horario de trabajo y además puede generar sus propios ingresos económicos. Desea continuar realizando su trabajo y más adelante quiere establecer un taller más grande con más máquinas de coser y más trabajadores para así aumentar su producción. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 500, por ello agradece la oportunidad que le brindan para que pueda concretar sus planes laborales, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el monto solicitado comprará materiales como hilos, agujas, botones, telas, forros y blondas para continuar confeccionando sus prendas de vestir.
texts.en: Astrid is 21 years old, married and has a young daughter.  They all live together in her mother-in-law's house.  Astrid makes a living producing clothes with customers coming to her many times to order a particular design or to repair an item.  On others occasions, Astrid herself is inspired to make new designs and produces her own clothes to later sell to her customers, family members and friends.  Astrid's workshop is in her mother-in-law's house, where a space has been set up for her to work in peace.  Astrid has had this business for two years and, in time, has learned to give her work a  good finish.  In addition to her dressmaking work, Astrid sells fizzy drinks and ice creams.  Astrid likes her work as she feels independent.  She sets her own timetable and generates her own income.  She would like to continue with her work and, in the future, set up a larger workshop with more sewing machines and more workers in order to increase production.  Astrid is applying for a loan of 500 Nuevo Soles on this occasion.  She is grateful for the opportunity being provided so that she can make her plans a reality.  Astrid promises to make her repayments on time. Astrid will use this loan to buy materials such as threads, needles, buttons, material, lining and blond lace in order to continue producing her clothing items.

loans.use: to buy materials such as threads, needs, buttons, material, blond lace and lining.

loans.name: Marco Antonio

texts.es:
Marco tiene 47 años de edad, es soltero. Es una persona que tiene varios años de dedicarse a la agricultura y a la prestación de servicios desde hace varios años, oficio que aprendió de su  padre quien ya falleció. Se levanta a las 4:00 a.m. Junto a su madre para prepararse e irse a la parcela que alquila donde pasa parte de la mañana, luego se dirige a trabajar en la tarde a cuidar una finca.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar una novilla. Podrá obtener un buen ingreso para el sustento suyo ya que producirá leche. 
 Planea comprar un terreno para sembrar ya que alquila y  le resulta bastante costoso.
texts.en:
Marco is 47 and single. He has worked in agriculture and provided labour for several years. He learned this work from his late father. Marco and his mother get up at 4:00 am in order to get ready and go to the plot of land that they rent. There they spend part of the morning, and later Marco goes to care for another farm in the afternoons.
This loan, which he is requesting from Fundación Campo, is for the purchase of a young cow. He will be able to obtain a good income from this because it will produce milk.
He plans to buy a plot of land on which to sow crops; he currently rents land, and this is quite expensive.

loans.use: to buy a young cow.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: Juana, de 52 años, está casada y tiene 5 hijos con quienes vive en su casa propia. El trabajo de Juana se inicia muy temprano, tiene su taller de confección el cual está instalado en su hogar en donde realiza el arreglo de prendas y la confección de los mismos segun el gusto del cliente. Lleva más de 30 años wn watw negocio y lo realiza sola. Lo que le gusta de este trabajo es que sus clientes le ayudan a ser mejor cada día tanto laboral como emocionalmente, además asegura que sus clientes son selectos y eso le permite recibir buenos pagos por cada una de sus prendas. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 800 soles y se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el monto solicitado comprará telas especiales, hilos de colores, agujas y otros materiales de confección.
texts.en:
Juana, age 52, is married and has five children with whom she lives in her own home. She starts work very early in the morning. She has a sewing workshop in her home where she makes and repairs garments based on her clients' wishes. She has had this business for over thirty years, and she works alone. What she likes about this job is that her clients help her to be better every day, both in her work and her personality. She tells us that her clients are exclusive and this allows her to make a good income from each garment she makes. 
She is requesting 800 soles, and she is grateful for this financial support to get ahead. She promises to repay her quotas punctually. With the requested loan, she will buy special fabric, coloured threads, needles, and other sewing materials.

loans.use: to buy special fabric, coloured thread, needles, and other items.

loans.name: Jose Ignacio

texts.es:
Jose tiene 39 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Imperial, la cual tiene un clima cálido y acogedor, asimismo se desarrolla la agricultura, en especial el cultivo de manzana. Jose es un hombre muy trabajador, sobre todo porque apoya  a sus padres, quienes no tienen muchos ingresos económicos. Desde muy joven aprendió a ganarse el pan con el sudor de la frente, es por ello que solo estudio hasta el quinto grado de secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar la carrera de mecánica. 

Día a día Jose trabaja en el camal municipal, lugar donde se vende la carne de ganado vacuno y porcino, Jose trabaja alrededor de 9 horas al día y el cree que está saliendo adelante porque es muy responsable y sobre todo porque es muy cumplido.

Jose esta muy agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá colocar piso de cemento a la vivienda donde habita, con lo cual podrá mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Estudiar una carrera universitaria y poder apoyar a sus hermanos a salir adelante”.
texts.en:
Jose is 39 and lives in the city of Imperial, which has a hot and welcoming climate. Agriculture, especially apple cultivation, is common there. Jose is a very hard-working man, because he supports his parents; they do not have many economic resources. He learned to earn his daily bread with the sweat of his brow at a very young age. This is why he only attended school until the fifth grade of secondary school. He would have liked to study to be a mechanic.
Jose works day in, day out, at the municipal slaughterhouse, where beef and pork are sold. He works around nine hours per day, and believes that he is getting ahead because he is very responsible and, above all, polite and thoughtful.
Jose is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to their support he will be able to install a cement floor in his home. This will improve his family's quality of life, and he will be able to keep working toward his greatest dream: "To study at a university and to be able to help my siblings to succeed".

loans.use: to install a cement floor in his home.

loans.name: Las Amigas Del 22 Group

texts.es: Un grupo conformado por 7  mujeres  responsables a distintas actividades comerciales. Así son las integrantes del grupo comunal. “LAS AMIGAS DEL 22” una de ellas es la Sra. YNGRID de 33 años soltera  y con 2 hijos, la Sra. Yngrid  se dedica ya hace 3 años a la venta de productos de belleza en un pequeño local  todos los días con el merito de salir adelante y así poder pagar el colegio de sus hijos, Con el fruto de su esfuerzo la Sra. yngrid   ha logrado mejorar su vivienda y apoyar en la educación de sus hijos. Seguir mejorando su negocio, su mayor deseo es que sus hijos sean profesionales es por eso  que la Sra. Yngrid   trabaja mucho , Con el préstamo otorgado lo invertirá  en comprar más cosméticos de belleza  y así poder tener más ingresos. A la vez a la Sra. Yngrid se encuentra sentada en el medio y se le distingue con chompa azul, se despide con un abraso a Kiva y Edaprospo y  agradece el crédito brindado ya que hace posible su progreso.
texts.en:
The "Las Amigas Del 22" group is made up of seven responsible women who have distinct businesses. One of the members is Yngrid, who is 33, single, and has two children. She has sold beauty products every day for three years in a small store with the goal of getting ahead and being able to pay for her children's education. Through her hard work, Yngrid has been able to improve her home and support her children in their education. She continues to improve her business. Her greatest desire is for her children to become professionals; this is why she works so much.
She will invest this loan in the purchase of cosmetics in order to have a greater income. 
Yngrid is pictured sitting in the middle wearing a blue sweater. She says goodbye and sends a hug to Kiva and Edaprospo. She is grateful for this support, as it is making it possible for her to progress.

loans.use: to buy beauty products.

loans.name: Irene Elizabeth

texts.es:
Irene tiene 23 años de edad vive en unión libre con el compañero y con  los hijos viven en la cuidad de ventanas provincia de los Ríos.

La ventanilla el laurel se encuentras ubicada en el recinto el laurel de la parroquia zapotal nuevo perteneciente al cantón ventanas se dedica a labores agrícolas

Irene se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol además a la crianza de gallinas y cerdos, con crédito le ayudado a invertir en semillas, abonos, y fertilizantes para los cultivos y en balanceado para los animales.  El crédito es de gran ayuda para aumentar la producción.

El sueño de Irene es tener dinero para arreglar la casa.

Le gusta bailar y ver novelas.
texts.en:
Irene is 23 and in a common-law marriage. She lives with her partner and children in the city of Ventanas, Los Rios province.
The El Laurel communal bank is located in the El Laurel district of the Zapotal Nuevo parish, belonging to the Ventanas canton. The residents work in agriculture.
Irene works in agriculture and plants corn, rice, and beans. She also raises chickens and hogs. She will invest this loan in the purchase of seeds, manure, and fertilizer for her crops, as well as feed for her animals. Loans are a great help in increasing production.
Irene's dream is to have money to fix up her house.
She enjoys dancing and watching soap operas.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, and fertilizer for her crops, as well as feed for her animals.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María, de 38 años de edad. Está casada con Hilter quien es empleado y padre de sus 3 hijos con quienes vive en su casa propia. María se dedica a la venta de comidas en el frontis de su vivienda, ella se levanta temprano para empezar la faena diaria, cocina durante el día para que al acercarse la noche pueda ofrecer sus platos regionales. Asegura que tiene clientes que ha podido ganar y mantener gracias a la calidad de la comida que ofrece, tiene muy buena sazón y eso hace que sus clientes le sean fieles. Lleva 3 años en está actividad y lo hace sola ya que sus hijos tienen que estudiar. Complementa este negocio con la venta de gaseosas,  aguas envasadas y helados. Le fascina hacer su trabajo por que siempre le gustó la cocina. Asegura que es muy gratificante observar el rostro de agrado que muestran sus clientes cuando consumen sus platos. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 2500, está muy contenta por el apoyo financiero que recibe pra seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el monto solicitado comprará verduras, tubérculos y diversas carnes para continuar preparando sus deliciosos platos.
texts.en:
María, age 38, is married to Hilter, who is employed. They have three children and live together in their own home. Maria sells food in the front part of her home. She gets up early to do the daily chores, and cooks during the day so that when the night arrives she is able to offer her regional dishes. She tells us that she has been able to gain and maintain clients thanks to the quality of her food. Her food is very tasty, and this makes her customers loyal. She has had this business for three years and she works alone because her children have to study.
She complements this business with the sale of pop, bottled water, and ice cream. She loves her work because she has always enjoyed cooking. She tells us that it is very gratifying to see people's happy faces when they eat her food.
She is requesting 2500 soles. She is very happy to have this financial support to get ahead, and promises to repay her quotas punctually. With this loan, she will purchase vegetables, tubers, and various meat in order to continue preparing her delicious dishes.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, tubers, meat, and other items.

loans.name: Mujeres Independientes Group

texts.es: Luz  de 38 años de edad soltera y sin hijos, luz  se dedica ya hace 2  años a la venta de ropa  en un pequeño puesto todos los días, luz   nos cuenta que ha llegado a fidelizar a sus clientes lo cual a generando ingresos  para cubrir los gastos de su casa,  En el futuro le gustaría tener un local propio donde poder vender su ropa  y obtener mayores ganancias económicas. Con el préstamo otorgado lo invertirá  en comprar mas prendas de vestir y así poder tener más ingresos. A la vez a luz se le observa en la foto que está sentada a la mano derecha con pantalón rojo,  se despide con un abraso a Kiva y   diciéndoles que cumplirá todas su metas propuestas.
texts.en: Luz is 38 years old, single, and has no children.  For the past two years she has been selling clothing from a small stall every day.  She says that she has gotten loyal customers, which generates income to cover her household expenses.  In the future she would like to have her own shop where she can sell clothing and obtain greater income.  She will use the money from this loan to buy more clothing and be able to increase her income.  She appears in the photograph, seated to the right, wearing red pants.  She sends Kiva a hug and says that she will complete all of her goals.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Kombaté

texts.fr: Kombaté est un homme de 49ans. Marié, il a en charge 03 enfants âgés respectivement de 10, 7 et 05ans qui suivent toujours des études. Sa femme est revendeuse. Mr Kombaté quant à lui est frigoriste de profession. Il répare, vend des appareils frigorifiques à ses clients et sollicite un second crédit à WAGES pour acheter des machines servant à réparer les appareils et aussi acheter afin de revendre. Son souhait est d’assurer le bien – être de la famille tout en gardant pérenne son activité.
texts.en: Kombaté is a 49-year-old married man. He has three dependent children aged 10, 7 and 5 years old, and they are still in school. His wife is a retailer. Kombaté himself is a refrigeration mechanic. He repairs and sells refrigeration equipment to his customers and is seeking his second loan from WAGES to purchase machines used to repair appliances, and also to buy appliances to resell. He hopes to ensure the well being of his family while keeping his business sustainable.

loans.use: to purchase refrigeration equipment.

loans.name: Bahron

texts.ru: Бахрон  жизнерадостный мужчина в возрасте 30 лет. Он женат и имеет одного ребёнка. Живёт он со своей семьёй в небольшом селе. Бахрон очень хорошо относится к своей жене и ребёнку. Он старается делать всё, что необходимо для того, чтобы они жили в достатке и имели всё необходимое. Для того, чтобы иметь доход в семье Бахрон занимается собственным бизнесом. Он занимается животноводством. Это удобный вид  бизнеса для него, потому что он имеет дом возле поля, где свободно можно  пасти своих скот. Он выращивает этих скот и потом продаёт полученное от них мясо и молоко.  На сегодня у Бахрона в наличии имеется 6 голов крупно рогатого скота. В этом бизнесе также ему помогает жена. Она целый день работает по дому и ухаживает за скотом. В свободное время Бахрон также работает на строительных объектах помощником мастера. От этой работы он получает дополнительный заработок. Сейчас Бахрон мечтает построить для своей семьи большой и благоустроенный дом. Но для этого ему необходима большая сумма денег. Поэтому он планирует расширить свой бизнес животноводства, чтобы накопить достаточную сумму для построения дома. По этой причине Бахрон обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку рогатого скота. Он заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку его бизнеса.
texts.en: Bahron is a cheerful 30-year old man. He is married and has one child. He lives with his family in a small village. Bahron treats his wife and child very well. He attempts to do everything in order for them to have a comfortable life and their needs to be taken care of. As a source of income for his family, Bahron has his own business. He raises livestock. This is a good type of business for him because his house in near a field where cattle can graze. He fattens his cattle and then sells meat and dairy products. At present he has six heads of large cattle. His wife helps him in the business. All day she does household chores and takes care of the animals. In his free time, Bahron also works at construction site as an assistant foreman. He receives additional cameo fro this work. At present Bahron’s dream is to build a big and comfortable house for his family. But he needs a large sum of money to do this. For this reason Bahron has applied to Arvand for a loan intended for purchasing cattle. He thanks Arvand in advance for supporting its business.

loans.use: to buy  cattle.

loans.name: Florencia

texts.en:
Florencia is 62 years old, married, and has six children, one of whom is in school. 

Florencia is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Florencia requested a PHP 9,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation (NWTF) to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Florencia has been raising pigs for seven years now and has borrowed six times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Florencia would like to save money to expand her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to extend and expand her store.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy grocery items for her husband's grocery business.

loans.name: Akouélé

texts.fr: Akouélé vit avec son conjoint et leur seul enfant de 16ans à Lomé. Ce dernier est scolarisé. Akouélé s’est donnée à l’apprentissage de la couture et après sa formation, elle répond aux demandes des clients à domicile. Elle désire s’approvisionner en machine à coudre c’est pour cela, elle demande son premier crédit à WAGES. le profit tiré dans le service offerts à ses clients lui permettra d’agrandir son activité et d’assurer les besoins vitaux de la famille.
texts.en:
Akouélé lives with her husband and their only child, who is 16 years old, in Lome. Their child attends school. Akouélé herself has learned sewing, and after completing her training, now responds to the requests of her customers from her home.

She wants to purchase a sewing machine, and so has come to WAGES to request her first loan. The income she earns from the services she offers to customers will allow her to expand her business and ensure the basic needs of her family.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
Meet 24-year-old Rebecca from Waterloo Eastern area in Freetown. She is Single.  She began her business because she wants to create income to support herself and her parents. In 2008, Rebecca established her calling centre business.  She works at the business from 8:00am until 6:00pm, Morning to Friday. She says that the main challenges to her business are lack of finance to expand a big house.

Rebecca requires a loan in order to purchase more cards containing phone credit like Airtel for resale. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to improve her status of living and open a big shop. In the future, Rebecca plans to further her education and become a medical nurse. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase more cards containing phone credit for resale.

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James lives in the Kisii area of Kenya. He has three children. He is a farmer, which he has been doing for five years. His primary income sources are milk, eggs, tea, crops, and personal business.

James is requesting a loan from Juhudi Kilimo, which he will use to buy a dairy cow.  His biggest challenges are the lack of market and poor roads. This loan will improve his family's living standards.

As part of Juhud Kilimo's loan appraisal process, each borrower's assets are evaluated. James owns the following: cow, poultry, motorcycle. He does not own pig, pump, bicycle, automobile. Juhudi Kilimo also tries to measure any change in living standards based on this loan. James has a mosquito net, TV, DVD, but he does not have electricity, solar power, running water, or a sewing machine.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a computer.

loans.name: Sabino

texts.es:
El señor Sabino es originario del estado de San Luis Potosí, tiene 43 años de edad y tiene mas de 30 años radicando en la ciudad de Nuevo Laredo, esta casado con la señora Laura, con quien tiene tres hijos cuales ya están casados y tiene su propia familia.
Esta solicitando un préstamo para realizar los acabados del interior de la cocina de su vivienda ya que no cuenta con el dinero para realizar la mejora.
El señor Sabino recibe una pensión gubernamental por invalides, también tiene un pequeño negocio de venta de tacos mañanera  en diferentes partes de la ciudad lo atiende el señor Sabino y su esposa la señora Laura. Estos son los ingresos que generan para salir adelante.
Con la el ingreso que recibe de la pensión es para pagar el crédito y que con la ganancias de los tacos es para los gastos familiares.
Desean mejorar la calidad de vida y que su patrimonio este en las mejores condiciones y que tengan la comodidad para el y su esposa.
texts.en:
Sr. Sabino is originally from the state of San Luis Potosí. He moved to the city of Nuevo Laredo more than 30 years ago. Sabino is 43 years old and married to Sra. Laura. They have three children who are already married and have their own families.

Sabino is requesting a loan so that he can finish the interior of the kitchen in his home. However, he does not have the money to make this improvement.

Sr. Sabino receives a disability pension from the government. He also has a small taco business where he sells in mornings in different parts of the city. Sabino and his wife Laura manage this business. These forms of income help them to move forward. The income from his pension will be used to repay the loan, while the profits from the taco business will be used for family expenses.

Sabino wants to improve his quality of life and keep his property in better condition so that he and his wife can be comfortable.

loans.use: to finish the interior of his kitchen.

loans.name: Fanny Aracely

texts.es:
Fanny tiene 32 años de edad es casada tiene 3 hijos con el compañero y con  los hijos viven en la cuidad de ventanas provincia de los Ríos.

La ventanilla el laurel se encuentras ubicada en el recinto el laurel de la parroquia zapotal nuevo perteneciente al cantón ventanas se dedica a labores agrícolas

Fanny se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol además a la crianza de pollos y cerdos, con crédito le ayudado a invertir en semillas, abonos, y fertilizantes para los cultivos y en balanceado para los animales.  El crédito es de gran ayuda para aumentar la producción.

El sueño es incremetar la produccion de los cultivos y comprar mas animales.

Le gusta hacer deporte y limpiar la casa.
texts.en:
Fanny is 32 years old, married, and she and her companion have 3 children. She lives in the city of Ventanas, De los Rios province. 

Her “Laurel Tree” communal bank is located in the Laurel neighborhood of Nuevo Zapotal parish, Ventanas canton, and its members are dedicated to agriculture.

Fanny is a farmer who sows corn, rice, and beans. In addition, she raises chickens and pigs. With this loan she will invest in seeds, manure, and fertilizers for her crops and, also, in feed for her animals. The loan will be a great help for augmenting production.

Fanny's dream is to increase crop production and to purchase more animals. She likes to play sports and clean the house.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure,  and fertilizers for her crops and feed for her animals.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a roll of fabric, a packet of thread, half a roll of elastic and a packet of buttons.

loans.name: Obidon

texts.fr: Détentrice d’un bar et revendeuse en même temps des produits d‘alimentation générale, madame Obidon âgée de 33ans sollicite un premier prêt à WAGES pour s’approvisionner en marchandises. Elle espère garder sa clientèle car elle est souvent confrontée au problème de concurrence. Elle est mariée et mère de famille d’01 enfant de 03ans.
texts.en:
Obidon is the manager of a bar and retailer of general food supplies. She is 33 years old, and is seeking her first loan from WAGES to purchase a supply of merchandise.

She hopes to maintain her customer base because she often faces the problem of competing businesses. She is married and mother of one child, who is three years old.

loans.use: to purchase general food supplies and beverages.

loans.name: Jacinto

texts.pt:
Jacinto é operador de equipamento pesado numa empresa de caminhos de ferro, tem 54 anos de idade é casado e pai de 6 filhos dos quais 4 estudam e outros 2 ainda menores de idade.
Com o valor do empréstimo quer comprar cimento, chapas de zinco, e ferro para dar continuidade a contrução de sua casa.
Para conseguir realizar este projecto irá pedir mais empréstimos pois com o seu salario não seria possίvel ou levaria mais tempo para concretizá- los.
texts.en: Jacinto is a heavy machine operator in a railroad company. He is 54 years old and married, and he has six children, four of whom are still in school. He plans to use this loan to buy cement, sheet metal, and rebar to continue the construction on his house. He will request further loans to complete this project, as it would not be possible with his salary or would take much longer to achieve.

loans.use: to buy cement, sheet metal, and rebar to continue the construction on his house.

loans.name: Isomiddin

texts.ru: Исомиддин живет в районе Носири Хусрав в южной части Таджикистана. Ему 37 лет. Он женат, имеет одного сына и одну дочь, учащихся в школе. Вместе с ними также живут его мать и отец. Исомиддин занимается животноводством. Он закупает крупнорогатый скот, откармливает в течение 30-35 дней и продает с наценкой на скотном рынке. Ему в деятельности помогает его племянник. Исомиддин занимается данным бизнесом уже 4 года. Одновременно он вместе с отцом занимается земледелием. Сейчас в его хозяйстве имеются две коровы и два телят. Исомиддин хочет увеличить поголовье скота для расширения деятельности. Он просит кредит для закупа трех бычков с целью дальнейшего откорма и продажи. За счет полученной прибыли Исомиддин планирует провести ремонт в доме и улучшить условия проживания семьи.
texts.en: Isomiddin lives in the Nosiri Khusrav district in southern Tajikistan. He is 37, married, and has a son and a daughter who are in school. His mother and father also live with the family. Isomidden buys cattle, fattens them up for 30-35 days, and then sells them for profit at the local cattle market. His nephew helps him with his work. Isomidden has been raising cattle for four years and also plants crops with his father. He currently has two cows and two calves and wants to buy more cattle to expand the business. He has asked for a loan to buy three bulls to fatten and resell. He plans to remodel his house and improve his family's living conditions with the profits.

loans.use: to purchase three bulls and expand his business

loans.name: Lazaro

texts.pt:
Lázaro é pensionista militar e trabalha como técnico veterinário numa empresa do ramo agrίcola. 
Ele é casado e tem 8 filhos dos quais 4 são maiores de idade, 3 estudam e 1 não tem ainda idade escolar.
Com o valor ira comprar cimento, chapas, barrotes, areia e rede tubarao para fazer um aviario na sua casa. 
Para o futuro tem planos de terminar a construcao do aviario mais tarde criar tambem porcos para revenvder reforcando assim a renda familias.
Diz que ira solicitar mais credito para realizacao de seu plano.
texts.en:
Lazaro has retired from the military and works as a veterinary technician in an agricultural company.
He is married and the father of eight children, four of whom are adults, three of whom are in school, and one of whom is not yet old enough to go to school.
He will use this loan to buy cement, sheet metal, joists, sand, and fishing net to build an aviary at his home.
In the future he plans to finish building the aviary and then raise pigs to sell so he can increase his family’s income.
He says that he will request more loans to carry out these plans.

loans.use: to buy cement, sheet metal, joists, sand, and fishing net to build an aviary at his home.

loans.name: Laiane

texts.pt:
Laiane de  57 anos de idade, é casado e pai de 2 filhos já maiores de idade. Vive na casa própria com sua esposa. Ele e auxiliar numa empresa de caminhos de ferro.
Com o valor do credito Laiane quer comprar material eléctrico para sua casa de 1 quarto e sala e rebocar.
Tem como planos para o futuro terminar as obras de sua casa e mobilar.
Diz que gosta dos serviços da Hluvuku pois conseguiu melhorar as condições de sua casa - antes vivia numa casa feita de material precário e agora conseguiu uma com material convencional.
texts.en:
Laiane, 57 years old, is married and the father of two adult children. He lives in his own home with his wife. He is an assistant at a railroad company.
Laiane wants to use this loan to buy materials to install electricity in and plaster his small home.
In the future, he hopes to finish the work on his house and furnish it.
He says he likes Hluvuku’s services because they have allowed him to improve his home. He used to live in a house built of scraps, and now he lives in one built of standard materials.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for his house.

loans.name: Clemencia

texts.pt:
Clemência  de 37 anos é enfermeira, casada e mãe de 2 filhos que estudam na 3ª e 8ª classes respectivamente e vive na casa própria. Com o valor do empréstimo irá comprar cimento e janelas para continuar a construção da sua casa. No futuro pretende fazer uma dependência que passaria a servir de quarto para um dos filhos.
Diz que irá pagar pontualmente e voltar a solicitar outros créditos para poder realizar seus planos.
texts.en:
Clemência, 37 years old, is a nurse. She is married and has two children, who are in the third and eighth grades. She lives in her own home. She plans to use this loan to buy cement and windows to continue building her house. In the future she would like to add another room that will serve as a bedroom for one of her children.
She says she will make her loan payments on time and request other loans so she can carry out her plans.

loans.use: to buy cement and windows to continue building her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to install new plumbing in her home.

loans.name: Miriam Del Carmen

texts.es:
Miriam es una mujer de 41 años de edad, madre de dos hijas. Ella trabaja en la agricultura desde hace varios años, fue su esposo quien le motivo a aprender. Se levanta a las 5:00 a.m. Para ir a la parcelas donde siembra durante el resto de la mañana y sus hijos van a la escuela; mientras ella en la tarde se dedica a vender pupusas y comida típica

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar dos  Vacas  lecheras que le vende un familiar.  Con la venta de la leche mejorara su negocio lo que le generara mejores ingreso para su sustento de su familia. Ella en un futuro piensa construir un cafetín en donde venderá y atenderá mejor a sus clientes; ya que por el momento lo hace en una casa de lamina.
texts.en:
Miriam is a 41-year-old woman, mother to 2 daughters. She has worked in agriculture for various years now. It was her husband who motivated her to learn. Miriam rises at 5:00 am to work the parcels she cultivates for the rest of the morning, while her children attend school. Then afternoons, she sells typical Salvadoran dishes such as “pupusas.”

The loan she is requesting through the Campo Foundation is for purchasing 2 milk cows from a family member. Selling milk will improve her business, generating better income for sustaining her family. 

Miriam hopes to construct a cafeteria in the future where she can sell her dishes and better attend to her customers. At present she is doing so in her own house made of laminate.

loans.use: to buy 2 milk cows.

loans.name: Aida

texts.pt:
Aida tem 34 anos de idade, mãe de 5 filhos dos quais apenas 1 não estuda pois e menor de idade. Ela é trabalhadora de uma empresa do ramo agrίcola como empacotadora ha 4 anos. 
E viuva é diz ter perdido sua casa a favor da famίia do esposo tendo ficado apenas com um terreno que havia adiquirido com o falecido marido e passou a viver na casa de sua mãe contruindo a sua naquele espaço.
Com o valor do empréstimo ira comprar aros, portas, cimento e janelas para terminar sua casa.
No futuro quer  fazer instalação eléctrica na sua casa e comprar electrodomésticos para sua famÍlia.
 Diz que ira pangar pontualmente para voltar a solicitar mais emprestimos para realizar seus projetos.
texts.en: Aida is 34 years old and the mother of five children, only one of whom is still in school. She has worked as a baler for an agricultural company for four years. She is a widow and says she lost her house to her husband’s family. She has only a plot of land she and her late husband purchased, and she moved back in with her mother while she builds her own home. She will use this loan to buy doors, cement, and windows to finish her house. In the future she would like to install electricity in her house and buy appliances for her family. She says she will make her payments on time so that she can request more loans to pursue her projects.

loans.use: to buy doors, cement, and windows to finish her house.

loans.name: Oscar Alejandro

texts.es:
Oscar tiene 20 años de edad es casado con la esposa y con  los hijos viven en la cuidad de ventanas provincia de los Ríos.

La ventanilla el laurel se encuentras ubicada en el recinto el laurel de la parroquia zapotal nuevo perteneciente al cantón ventanas se dedica a labores Agrícolas

Oscar se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol además a la crianza de gallinas y cerdos, con crédito le ayudado a invertir en semillas, abonos, y fertilizantes para los cultivos y en balanceado para los animales.  El crédito es de gran ayuda para aumentar la producción.

El sueño es tener dinero para comprar un terreno y seguir sembrando.

Le gusta hacer deporte con la familia.
texts.en:
Oscar, 20, is married and lives with his wife and children in Ventanas in Los Ríos province. The communal bank El Laurel is located in El Laurel in Zapotal Nuevo parish in Ventanas canton. All the members are farmers.

Oscar grows corn, rice, and beans and raises hens and pigs. The loan will help him buy seed, manure, fertilizer, and nutritious animal feed and increase production. He dreams of buy land and continue planting. He likes to play sports with his family.

loans.use: to buy seed, manure, fertilizer, and feed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to waterproof her house and to paint the security bars.

loans.name: Gerardo Andres

texts.es:
Gerardo tiene 26 años de edad vive en unión libre tiene un hijo, vive con la esposa y con los hijos en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

La VRC LUCHANDO JUNTOS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Zapotal nuevo, Pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a Labores Comerciales en su mayoría. 

Gerardo se dedica desde a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz y arroz.Con el apoyo del credito puede tener mas productos.

Solicita el crédito para poder tener capital para la agricultura para la comprar de semillas y fertilizantes, Con la ayuda del crédito le ayudará a tener un beneficio para la familia.

El sueño es tener casa propia.

En los tiempos libres le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Gerardo, 26, lives in a free union and has a son. He lives with his wife and child in Ventanas canton in Los Ríos province. The communal bank Luchando Juntos (Striving Together) is located is Zapotal Nuevo in Ventanas canton. Most of the members are merchants. 

Gerardo grows corn and rice. He will buy more supplies with the loan, which will give him capital to purchase seed and fertilizer and will benefit his family. He dreams of owning his own house. He likes to play sports in his free time.

loans.use: to buy seed and fertilizer.

loans.name: Cesar

texts.es:
El señor Cesar tiene 31 años de edad, esta casado con la señora Maritza Elizabeth con quien tiene una hija 5 años que esta estudiando en preescolar. El señor Cesar trabaja para una tienda de muebles en al aria de gerente desde hace dos años. La señora Maritza Elizabeth se dedica al cuidado y atención de su hija.
A la vivienda le están haciendo falta los acabados del exterior, están solicitando un préstamo ya que no cuentan con el dinero necesario para realizar la mejora y pagarle a la persona que se encargara de terminar los acabados.
Con una parte de sueldo que recibe el señor Cesar de su trabajo es para pagar el crédito y que es la única fuente de ingreso que tiene.
texts.en:
Sr. Cesar is 31 years old and married to Sra. Maritza Elizabeth. They have a five-year-old daughter who is in preschool. Sr. Cesar has been working for two years as a manager at a furniture store while Sra. Maritza Elizabeth takes care of their daughter.

Their home lacks the finishing touches to the exterior, so they are requesting a loan since they do not have the money needed to make this improvement. They will also pay someone to complete the work.

Part of Sr. Cesar’s salary will be used to repay the loan since his job is the only source of income that they have.

loans.use: to finish the exterior of his house.

loans.name: Rafaela Isabel

texts.es: Doña Rafaela es habitante del barrio Memorial Sandino, una zona marginal de Managua, ella ha sido madre soltera, sola siempre busca la manera de cómo salir adelante, hoy en día solamente tiene a una hija bajo su cargo quien está estudiando y la apoya mediante la venta de ropa, la cual en la actualidad no tiene casi nada en su inventario ya que ha sufrido problemas de salud y tuvo que ocupar los ingresos de las ventas. Solicita el crédito para poder invertir en su negocio comprando dos pacas y el resto en cosméticos, con esta inversión doña Rafaela espera recuperarse económicamente para garantizar los pagos diarios del hogar.
texts.en: Rafaela lives in Memorial Sandino, a low-income area of Managua. She has been a single mother and always sought to get ahead. She now cares for one daughter, who studies and helps her sell clothing. Rafaela has very little inventory because she was ill and had to use her earnings to pay bills. She has applied for a loan to buy two bags of bulk clothing and cosmetics. Rafaela hopes the loan will help her recover financially and pay her daily household expenses.

loans.use: to buy two bags of clothing and cosmetics.

loans.name: Tomas Pascual

texts.es:
Tomas tiene 62 años de edad vive en unión libre tiene cinco hijos, vive con la esposa y con los hijos en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

La VRC LUCHANDO JUNTOS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Zapotal nuevo, Pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a Labores Comerciales en su mayoría. 

Tomas se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz y arroz.Con el apoyo del credito puede tener mas productos.

Solicita el crédito para poder tener capital para la agricultura para la comprar de semillas y fertilizantes, Con la ayuda del crédito le ayudará a tener un beneficio para la familia.

El sueño es darle mejor vida a la familia.

En los tiempos libres le gusta ir a rio.
texts.en:
Tomas, 62, lives in a free union and has five children. He lives with his spouse and children in Ventanas canton in Los Ríos province. The communal bank Luchando Juntos (Striving Together) is located in Zapotal Nuevo in Ventanas canton. Most of the members are merchants.

Tomas grows corn and rice. He has applied for the loan to buy farm supplies, seed and fertilizer. The loan will benefit his family, and he dreams of giving them a better life. He likes to go to the river in his free time.

loans.use: to buy seed and fertilizer.

loans.name: Geruncia

texts.en:
Geruncia is married and she works hard to support her family.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. She earns additional income from selling medicine. Geruncia is borrowing PHP 20000 through NWTF in order to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

Geruncia has been sustaining her business activities through her past six loans from NWTF and more recently through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Neptali

texts.es: Neptali, tiene 28 años de edad, vive en el municipio de Morazán Yoro, junto a su esposa y una hija. El se ha dedicado a realizar trabajos agrícolas, y tiene más de 4 años de haber comenzado a realizar otras actividades para generar más ingresos al hogar. El compra cerdos y los destaza para vender la carne y también vende refrescos, y topogigios (helados). Ha decidido solicitar un segundo préstamo por 4,000 Lempiras para comprar frutas para elaborar jugos naturales y compra de refrescos de botella para la venta. Con esta otra inversión podrá seguir trabajando para el sostenimiento de su familia. Su plan es crecer con el negocio y darle lo mejor a su esposa e hija.
texts.en:
Neptali, 28, lives in the city of Morazán Yoro with his wife and daughter. He is a farmer, but, for over four years, he has engaged in other activities to generate more income for his household. He buys and raises pigs to sell for meat and also sell beverages and ice cream.

He has applied for a loan of 4,000 lempiras to buy fruit to make natural juices and to buy bottled beverages to sell. The loan will let him continue to work to support his family. He plans to grow his business and give his wife and daughter the best.

loans.use: to buy fruit to make natural juices and to buy bottled beverages.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase lotions, talc powder, lipstick, body spray, blush, and facial cream to sell

loans.name: Lyndelou

texts.en:
Lyndelou is married and she works hard to support her family.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. She earns additional income from clothing sales and manicures. Lyndelou is borrowing PHP 29500 through NWTF in order to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Lyndelou has been sustaining her business activities through her past nine loans from NWTF and more recently through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Myrna

texts.en:
Myrna is 51 years old, married and has three children. 

Myrna is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Myrna requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Myrna has been raising pigs for six years now, and has borrowed nine times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Myrna would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Robina

texts.en:
Robina is 35 years old and married with three children, two of whom are in school. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur.

Robina has an egg retailing business in the Philippines. Robina requested a PHP 11000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell.

Robina has been in this business for three years. In the future, Robina would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell.

loans.name: Oscar Antonio

texts.es:
Oscar  tiene 38 años de edad, esta acompañado y tiene dos hijos. Él  ha pasado momentos muy difíciles; su padre los abandono cuando estaba muy pequeño, obligando así  a su mama a tener que hacerse cargo de llevar el sustento para su familia, teniendo ella que emigrar  a trabajar en la capital como costurera, dejando a Oscar y sus hermanos con los abuelos.

Pero Oscar fue aprendiendo  a trabajar la tierra con sus abuelos y a podido ir pasando la vida.  Cuando ya formo su propia familia ha podido ir construyendo su propia casita, con su trabajo en la milpa y trabajando en los cañales  que hay en la zona. Solo estudio hasta  el quinto año de estudio de educación básica, con ello ha podido entenderle a la albañilería, cuando hay oportunidades él trabaja en esto.

Compra los materiales e insumos en una comunidad que esta  a 3 kilómetros de su casa, trasladando los en su carreta.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para terminar de construir su casa, ya que le falta ponerle ventanas debido a que en invierno azota el agua. Desea estar tranquilo con su familia en su casa en la época de invierno, ademas podrá tener sus pertenencias totalmente seguras, ya que la situación de inseguridad en el país esta  creciendo.

Oscar sueña con tener  finalizada su casa y seguir trabajando la tierra y si es posible adquirir un par de vacas para tener  leche y subproductos de esta, para sus hijos.
texts.en:
Oscar, 38, lives with his partner and has two children. He has seen some difficult times. His father abandoned the family when Oscar was very young. His mother had to provide for the family by going to the capital to work as a seamstress and leaving Oscar and his siblings with his grandparents. Oscar learned to work the land with his grandparents and get on with his life.

When he started his family, he began building a house with money from his work in the fields and local canals. He only completed fifth grade, but the education helped him understand bricklaying, and he does this work when it is available. He buys materials and supplies in a town three kilometers from his house and transports them in his cart.

He has applied to Fundación Campo for a loan to finish building his house, which still needs windows to keep out the water in winter and keep his belongings safe, as lack of security is a growing problem in the country. Oscar dreams of finishing his house and continuing to work the land. He would like to buy a pair of cows to produce milk and milk products for his children.

loans.use: to finish building his house, which still needs windows to keep out the water in winter.

loans.name: Yorlenis

texts.es: Yorlenis, tiene 24 años de edad, está casada y tiene 2 hijos con quienes vive en la casa de su suegra. Yorlenis se dedica a la venta de comidas regionales. Atiende muy amablemente a sus clientes y esta actitud sumada a su buena sazón le ha permitido obtener muy buena acogida y demanda por los clientes de su barrio. Realiza este negocio desde hace 6 meses con la ayuda de su suegra. Le gusta su negocio pues comenta que le agrada cocinar gracias a las enseñanzas que le brindó su madre, del mismo modo también le agrada el ingreso económico que obtiene por sus ventas los cuales le han permitido pagar sus cuentas y ayudar a solventar los gastos básicos de su hogar. Al contrario no le gusta levantarse muy temprano por las mañanas para realizar los preparativos del día, pero eso no la desanima y continúa trabajando con mayor optimismo hasta culminar el día. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 500, comenta sentirse agradecida con el apoyo financiero que le brindarán para continuar desarrollando su negocio, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el monto solicitado comprará progresivamente todos los ingredientes que usa en la preparación de sus comidad como carnes, plátanos, aceite, condimentos, arroz, entre otros.
texts.en:
Yorlenis is a 24-year old woman who is married and has two children. They all live in her mother-in-law's house and she works selling regional dishes. She is very kind to her clients and very mature, which have resulted in a good reception and demand from her neighbors. She has been running this business with her mother-in-law's help for six months, and enjoys cooking the way her mother taught her. The income she obtains serves to pay the bills and cover basic household expenses. Although she does not enjoy getting up early to get ready for the day, she keeps up her optimism and enthusiasm. 

She is requesting 500 PEN and says she feels grateful for the financial support provided. She will use this amount to progressively buy the ingredients she needs, such as meat, bananas, oil, spices and rice, among others. She commits to repaying the loan as scheduled.

loans.use: to buy food products, such as meat, bananas, oil, spices and rice, among others.

loans.name: Melita

texts.es: Melita, de 39 años de edad, está casada con Francisco y juntos tienen 3 hijos de 18, 5 y 3 años de edad respectivamente con quienes vive en su casa propia. Melita se dedica a la fabricación de palitos de helado. Semanalmente acude a su vivienda un señor quien le trae los materiales necesarios para la elaboración de estos productos como triplay, pinturas y otros. La elaboración de los palitos se hace uno por uno de manera manual, los que son usados para los helados, sin embargo hay otros de mayor medida que son pintados para darles usos didácticos o decorativos. Cuando tiene la cantidad requerida envía sus productos en sacos a otras ciudades y por ello recibe un buen pago. Lleva trabajando en este negocio 2 años y trabaja con la ayuda de su hermana. Eventualmente, vende productos comestibles y bebidas las cuales envía a los centros poblados asentados en la ribera de los ríos. Le gusta su negocio pues le permite tener un ingreso económico para solventar sus gastos familiares, se siente feliz porque su negocio está creciendo a base de mucho esfuerzo ya que siempre está pensando en brindarles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 1500, está muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero que le permita seguir adelante con su negocio, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el monto solicitado comprará los materiales necesarios como triplay, cuchillas y pinturas para continuar elaborando los palitos de helados.
texts.en:
Melita is a 39-year old woman who is married to Francisco and has three children, aged 18, 5 and 3 years old. They all live together in their own house. Melita works making ice cream sticks and her supplier brings weekly the materials she needs, such as laminated wood, paint and others. She makes the sticks to be used for ice cream manually one by one. Others are painted for decorative and educational purposes. When she has a certain amount of sticks, she sends them in bags to other cities and receives the corresponding payment. She has been working in this business for two years and counts on her sister's help. Sometimes she also sells food products and beverages that are sent to localities by the river shores. She likes her business as it allows her to have income to cover household expenses and feels happy to see it grow thanks to her hard work. 

She is requesting 1,500 PEN and feels grateful for the financial support received. She will use this amount to buy the necessary materials, such as laminated wood, blades and paint, and commits to repaying as scheduled.

loans.use: to buy laminated wood, blades and paint.

loans.name: Chona

texts.en:
Chona is 42 years old, married, and a mother of two children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur.

Chona has a fishing business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to buy a new engine for her fishing boat.

Chona has been in this business for six years. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy a new engine for her fishing boat.

loans.name: Sugerin Yuliana

texts.es: Sugerin, tiene 30 años de edad, es madre soltera, vive con sus padres y sus dos hijos en el municipio de Morazán, Yoro. Anteriormente trabajaba en un supermercado y hace 5 años se decidió por su propio negocio de venta de ropa, calzado y cosméticos como desodorantes, cremas, y otros productos de limpieza. Dicha actividad es su fuente de ingresos para cubrir los gastos de su familia. El préstamo que solicito es el tercer ciclo con ODEF y es por la cantidad de 8,000 Lempiras, el cual lo utilizara para la compra de mercadería para el negocio como ropa y cosméticos. Su plan es satisfacer a sus clientes ofreciendo mas producto y poder darle lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Sugerin is 30 years old and is a single mother who lives with her parents and two children in the municipality of Morazán, Yoro. She used to work in a supermarket but decided to start her own business five years ago selling clothing, footwear and cosmetics including deodorant and lotions, and cleaning products. This economic activity brings in income to cover her family's expenses.

The loan that she is now requesting is her third with ODEF and is for 8,000 lempiras. She will use it to buy merchandise for her business including clothing and cosmetics. Her plan is to satisfy her customers by offering more products. She also plans to be able to give the best to her children.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her business including clothing and cosmetics.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase grains for trading business

loans.name: Wendy Johanna

texts.es: La cliente es del sector de Fortín.  Aprendió computación en los cursos del colegio, por lo cual decidió establecer este negocio de bazar/papelería donde también realiza impresiones a computadora y copias.  Labora sola de 8 am a 10 pm.  Es casada, su esposo es policía y tienen 4 hijos, de los cuales 3 asisten a la escuela fiscal de la zona.  Su sueño es poder montar un negocio más grande, con un cyber completo.  Desea el crédito para invertir en la compra de artículos de papelería (cuadernos, láminas y fomix) para su negocio.
texts.en: Wendy Johanna is from the Fortin neighborhood of Guayaquil.  She learned how to use computers in college courses she took, and so she decided to establish this general/stationery store business where she also makes computer print-outs and copies.  She works alone from 8am until 10pm.  She is married, and her husband is a policeman.  They have 4 children, 3 of whom attend the local public school.  Wendy's dream is to be able to have a bigger business with a full internet cafe.  She wants a loan to buy stationery items (notebooks, laminated sheets, and sheets of craft foam) for her business.

loans.use: to buy notebooks, laminated sheets, and sheets of craft foam

loans.name: Consuelo Maritza

texts.es:
Consuelo tiene 47 años de edad vive en Union libre tiene 7 hijos vive con el compañero y con  los hijos viven en la cuidad de ventanas provincia de los Ríos.

La ventanilla el laurel se encuentras ubicada en el recinto el laurel de la parroquia zapotal nuevo perteneciente al cantón ventanas se dedica a labores agrícolas

Consuelo se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz , con crédito le ayudado a invertir en semillas, abonos, y fertilizantes para los cultivos.  El crédito es de gran ayuda para aumentar la producción.

El sueño es incremenar la produccion y el negocio.

Le gusta trabajar y hacer deporte y hacer los quehaceres doesticos
texts.en:
Consuelo is 47 years old and lives in a common-law marriage. She has seven children. She lives with her partner and children. They live in the city of Ventanas in the Los Rios province.

The El Laurel communal bank is located in the El Laurel rural settlement in the Zapotal Nuevo parish, which is part of the Ventanas canton. It focuses on agricultural work.

Consuelo works in agriculture, growing corn and rice. This loan has helped her purchase seeds, manure, and fertilizer for her crops. The loan is of great help to increase production.

Consuelo's dream is to increase production and business. She likes working, playing sports, and doing housework.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, and fertilizer for her crops.

loans.name: Maria Del Rosario

texts.es: La señora María tiene cuarenta y cuatro (44) años de edad, vive en el municipio de Sabanagrande, pueblo ribereño, del departamento del Atlántico, a orillas del Gran Río Magdalena, principal arteria fluvial de Colombia. Reside con su conyugue y cuatro (4) hijos, tres (3) varones en edades de dieciocho (18), veintidós (22) y veinticuatro (24) años de edad, y una mujer de veintiséis (26) años. Su actividad de negocio consiste en la comercialización de mercancía variada como calzado y ropa de jeans para hombres y mujeres y blusas femeninas. De lunes a domingo, de ocho (8) de la mañana a ocho (8) de la noche, ejerce su actividad de negocio, comprando de contado en el mercado del centro de la ciudad de Barranquilla, capital del departamento del Atlántico, y vende a vecinos, familiares y amigos, a crédito. Desde hace tres (3) años inició esta actividad por la necesidad de buscar otra fuente de ingresos para su familia, comenzó con un capital pequeño la venta de calzado, y luego incluyo la venta de ropa. Este es su primer credikiva con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, el cual lo aplicará en la compra de ropa y calzado para hombres y mujeres, con esta inversión aumentará sus inventarios. Sueña con tener su local propio, y espera mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María is a 44-year old woman who lives in the municipality of Sabanagrande, a village by the shore of Gran Río Magdalena (main river in Colombia), in the department of Atlántico. She lives with her husband and their four children: three boys aged 18, 22 and 24, and one girl who is 26 years old. She works selling shoes, women blouses and clothes for men and women, Monday through Sunday from 8am to 8pm. She buys in cash in the market located downtown Barranquilla (capital of the department of Atlántico) and sells on credit to neighbors, family and friends. She started the business three years ago with an aim to find an additional income source for her family. She started with a small capital selling shoes and then added the clothing sale. 

This is her first loan with Kiva through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. She will use the requested amount to buy clothes and shoes for men and women, so that she can increase her stock. She dreams of having her own store and hopes to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy clothes and shoes for men and women.

loans.name: Pablo Cesar

texts.es:
Pablo tiene 19 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos vive con la tia en la cuidad de ventanas provincia de los Ríos.

La ventanilla el laurel se encuentras ubicada en el recinto el laurel de la parroquia zapotal nuevo perteneciente al cantón ventanas se dedica a labores agrícolas

Pablo se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz con crédito le ayudado a invertir en semillas, abonos, y fertilizantes para los cultivos.  El crédito es de gran ayuda para aumentar la producción.

El sueño es tener mas ingresos economicos con los cuales al ahorrar podria hacer la casa y seguir con el negocio.

Le gusta trabajar y hacer deporte y ayudar a la tia.
texts.en:
Pablo is 19 years old, unmarried and does not have children. He lives with his aunt in the city of Ventanas in the province of Los Ríos. 

The "El Laurel" Communal Bank is found located in the El Laurel recinto in the Zapotal Nuevo parish of the Ventanas canton, where agricultural activities are carried out. 

Pablo makes a living within agriculture planting corn. With loans he has been able to invest in seeds, manure and fertilizers for his crops. The loans are a great help to increase production. 

His dream is to have greater earnings with which he will be able to save in order to build his house and continue with the business. He enjoys working, playing sports and supporting his aunt.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and manure.

loans.name: Guilda Germania

texts.es: La cliente es del sector de Fortín en Guayaquil.  Aprendió años atrás del negocio mediante cursos públicos de arte.  Se dedica a la elaboración de artesanías y manualidades artísticas.  Labora sola de 8 am a 4 pm.  Es casada, su esposo es chofer y tiene 3 hijos que estudian en la escuela fiscal del barrio.  Desea en un futuro poder tener su local propio con más mercadería de la que produce actualmente.  Necesita invertir el dinero del préstamo en la compra de masilla, colores y pinceles para la creación de sus productos.
texts.en: This client is from the Fortín sector in Guayaquil.   She learned her business years ago by taking public art courses.  She works making arts and crafts.  She works alone from 8am until 4pm.  She’s married and her husband is a driver; she has three children attending the local public school.  She hopes in future to be able to have a shop of her own with more merchandise than what she produces currently.  She needs to invest the money from the loan in the purchase of modeling clay, paints and brushes for the creation of her products.

loans.use: to buy modeling clay, brushes and paints.

loans.name: Guadalupe Lucía

texts.es: La cliente reside en el sector de Fortín en Guayaquil.  Comenzó a vender la línea Yanbal hace 9 años y luego diversificó con las líneas de Avon y Essika.  Labora todos los días, con un horario de acuerdo a la realización de los pedidos de sus clientes.  Está en estado de unión libre, tiene un hijo de 7 años que estudia en la escuela fiscal del sitio.  Ahora necesita el préstamo para realizar la compra de artículos de belleza como lociones, perfumes y cremas de las líneas que comercializa.
texts.en: Guadalupe Lucia lives in the Fortin neighborhood of Guayaquil.  She started selling Yanbal beauty products 9 years ago, and later diversified into other brands such as Avon and Essika.  She works every day, and her schedule depends on the orders that her customers make.  She is in a common-law marriage that has produced a 7 year-old child who attends the local public school.  Guadalupe needs a loan at this time so that she can buy beauty products such as lotions, perfumes, and creams in the brand that she works with.

loans.use: to buy Yanbal brand beauty products

loans.name: Daniel Edgardo

texts.es:
Daniel tiene 45 años de edad, es casado y tiene dos hijos. Comenzó a trabajar en la agricultura desde los 12 años de edad, aprendió a trabajar la tierra con su padre y sus 6 hermanos. Además de sembrar maíz y frijol, se dedica a cultivar maicillo para obtener grano para alimentar sus gallinas, también el zacate de este lo aprovecha para alimentar su vaquita.

Don Daniel busca como llevar ingresos a su familia, en varias ocasiones trabaja como jornalero donde le pagan $5 dolares por día de trabajo. Los insumos y materiales los adquiere en una ciudad que se encuentra a 10 kilómetros de distancia a su casa, los transporta en bus para ahorrar un poco.

El crédito lo necesita para comprar 2 terneros para engordarlos y luego venderlos, obteniendo un pequeño ingreso en el futuro. Tener el dinero para aprovechar la época (lluviosa) donde hay abundancia de pasto para alimentar el ganado.

Él quiere tener varios formas de ingreso para mejorar sus condiciones de vida de su familia, trabajando honradamente.
texts.en:
Daniel is a 45-year old man who is married and has two children. He started working in agriculture when he was 12 and learned how to work in the land with his father and his six brothers. He sows corn and beans and also cultivates sorghum to obtain grain for the hens and forage for his cow. 

Daniel looks to bring income to his family and sometimes works as a day laborer for $5 per day. He buys the necessary supplies and materials in a city located 10km away from his home and brings them by bus to save some money. 

He is requesting a loan to buy two calfs to feed them and then sell them, obtaining some profit in the future. He would make the most of the rainy season when there is plenty of grass to feed the livestock. He wants to have several income sources to improve the life conditions of his family by working honorably.

loans.use: to buy two calfs to feed them and sell them.

loans.name: Nuvia Cecilia

texts.es: La señora Nuvia tiene cuarenta y cinco (45) años de edad, vive en el municipio de Sabanagrande, departamento del Atlántico, pueblo ubicado a orillas del gran Río Magdalena, principal arteria fluvial de Colombia. Reside con su conyugue y dos hijos, una jovencita de catorce (14) años de edad, y un varon de doce (12) años. Su actividad de negocio consiste en la comercialización de perfumes; ejerce este oficio de lunes a domingo, de ocho (8) de la mañana a ocho (8) de la noche, vende a vecinos, amigos y familiares, a plazos cortos y medianos, y compra de contado a los proveedores. Este negocio lo inició hace dos (2) años, cuando su esposo viajaba a Estados Unidos y le mandaba perfumes para que ella los comercializara; de esta manera se fue haciendo a una clientela. Este es su primer credikiva con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, el cual lo aplicará en la compra de mas fragancias de perfumes, para ofrecerla a sus clientes y poder satisfacer su buen gusto. Con esta inversión aumentará su capital de trabajo, las ventas y su claidad de vida.
texts.en:
Nuvia is 45 years old and lives in the municipality of Sabanagrande in the department of Atlántico, located on the banks of the grand Río Magdalena which is the primary water source of Colombia. She lives with her partner and two children: a young 14 year old girl and a 12 year old boy. Her business consists of selling perfumes, which she does Monday through Sunday from 8am until 8pm. She sells to her neighbors, friends and acquaintances with short and medium term payment plans. 

She began this business two years ago when her husband traveled to the US and sent her perfumes to sell. In this way she began establishing her client base. This is her first Kiva loan with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, which she will use to buy more perfumes to offer to her clients and satisfy their tastes. With this investment, she will increase her working capital, sales and standard of living.

loans.use: to buy more perfumes for her customers.

loans.name: Afripads

texts.en:
In 2009, a unique company called AFRIpads was established in Uganda. Set up to help girls and women deal with their period in a dignified, affordable way, the company was distinctive in that it manufactures reusable sanitary pads in Uganda rather than importing them.  

Currently, AFRIpads employs over 40 local Ugandan women from rural areas who are pivotal both in the manufacturing process, and ultimately responding to the needs of girls who could not afford sanitary pads and were missing school during their periods. 

These women live in a small village called Kitengeesa about 3 hours’ drive from Kampala, which is off-grid with only basic facilities. With no access to power, they risk respiratory problems, fires and burns by depending on kerosene lamps for lighting in their homes and have to pay for their mobile phones to be charged which is a high cost luxury for them given the limited power supply.

AFRIpads approached Fenix International, a renewable energy company, to help provide their employees with access to clean, safe and affordable lighting plus empower them to generate additional income from phone charging. Fenix designs and manufacturers the ReadySet Solar Charger, a high quality, easy to use solar system that comes with a 15watt solar panel and provides up to 30 hours of lighting or charge up to 10 phones a day. The ReadySet allows a household to generate income of up to $50 per month by charging phones and generating savings by removing the need to purchase kerosene. They ReadySet is also capable of providing reliable energy to power other devices such as radios and hair clippers. 

Gorreth, an AFRIpad employee (pictured with her light and also shown with her fellow employees), has been testing the ReadySet Solar Charger in her small shop in the village, which she runs next to her AFRIpads job. With the new light, she has been able to keep her shop open for longer in the evening, helping her sell even more products plus she now makes additional income from offering phone charging to the village community for a small fee. She lives in her shop as well and having a light will make her life safer, so much so, she wants to buy one for her parents as well. 

Thanks to Kiva, Fenix will be able to supply their ReadySet Solar Charger on loan to AFRIpads’ employees, who can pay on affordable monthly installments over a year-long period. Payments are deducted directly from their pay slips each month, leaving them with profits and savings generated from the ReadySet Solar Charger to help improve their lives.

loans.use: To access clean, reliable, solar energy for AFRIpad employees

loans.name: Cornerstone

texts.en:
Teachers and workers at the Cornerstone organization in Uganda have dedicated themselves to giving under privileged youths the opportunity to turn their lives around, providing them with skills and capabilities they need to participate in society as independent, mature, and responsible individuals.

Employees at Cornerstone such as Peninah, a 29 year old and a single mother of one child, earns $120 a month and is able to take care of her child and obtain basic needs for home.  Whilst the school is connected the mains power, it can be unstable with regular blackouts that can last for days. Living in the staff quarter’s means she is highly dependent on kerosene lamps for lighting and this means exposing herself and her child to the risk of dangerous fumes, not to mention burns and fires associated with their use. Many other teachers are in a similar position and the need for both reliable lighting and power can be life changing. 

Cornerstone approached Fenix International, a renewable energy company, to help provide their employees with access to clean, safe and affordable lighting plus empower them to generate additional income from phone charging. Fenix designs and manufacturers the ReadySet Solar Charger, a high quality, easy to use solar system that comes with a 15watt solar panel and provides up to 30 hours of lighting or charge up to 10 phones a day. The ReadySet allows a household to generate income of up to $50 per month by charging phones and generating savings by removing the need to purchase kerosene. They ReadySet is also capable of providing reliable energy to power other devices such as radios and hair clippers.

Thanks to Kiva, Fenix will be able to supply their ReadySet Solar Charger on loan to over 48 Cornerstone teachers and staff (pictured), who can pay on affordable monthly installments over a year-long period. Payments are deducted directly from their pay slips each month, leaving them with profits and savings generated from the ReadySet Solar Charger to help improve their lives.

loans.use: Clean, renewable solar energy products for teachers at Cornerstone

loans.name: Valentina

texts.es: Valentina, tiene 28 años de edad y vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos en una aldea del municipio  Morazán, Yoro. Anteriormente apoyaba a su esposo en la agricultura y hace 8 años decidió hacer su propio negocio de venta de ropa nueva y usada como camisas, pantalones, blusas y ropa interior. Ha obtenido varios préstamos con ODEF para mantener activo su negocio. Actualmente solicita el decimo ciclo por la cantidad de 4,000 lempiras para comprar mercadería como camisas y pantalones para vender. Su objetivo es seguir creciendo con el negocio y darles el estudio a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Valentina is a 28-year old woman who lives with her husband and two children in a village of the municipality of Morazán, Yoro. After having helped her husband in agriculture for some time, she decided to start her own business 8 years ago. She sells new and used clothes, such as shirts, pants, blouses and underwear. 

She has received several loans through ODEF to keep her business active and is now requesting her tenth cycle for 4,000 HNL. She will use this amount to buy goods, such as shirts and pants. Her goal is to grown the business and provide her children with an education.

loans.use: to buy goods, such as shirts and pants for sale.

loans.name: Mujeres En Acción Group

texts.es:
La señora Beatriz Adriana es de estado civil casada, de 54 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, tiene 4 hijos y 1 de ellos esta estudiando, se dedica a vender en su tienda de productos de consumo diario, inició este negocio con una tiendita y hasta el momento lleva 12 años de larga experiencia. Cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica a la sastreria.

Organiza un grupo y solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para surtir más su tienda ya que ha tenido mucha demanda, comprará productos lacteos, huevos, aceite, cerales, azucar, etc. desea en el futuro tener una tienda grande y brindarle el mejor servicio a su comunidad. Las demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a actividades agrícolas y crienza de animales. En la fotografia aparecen 17 integrantes pero solo a 13 de ellas se le concedió el préstamo.
texts.en:
Beatriz Adriana is a 54-year old woman who is married and has four children, one of whom is studying. She did not have the opportunity to study herself and works selling everyday basic products at her store. She started this business 12 years ago and has a lot of experience. She counts with the support of her husband, who works in tailoring. 

She has put together a group and is requesting a loan that she will use to buy supplies for the store following a high demand. She will buy dairy products, eggs, oil, cereals, sugar, etc. She hopes to have a big store in the future and to provide the community with a better service. The other members of the group work in agriculture and livestock. Only 13 members of the 17 shown in the photo were granted the loan.

loans.use: to buy everyday basic products.

loans.name: April

texts.en:
April is married and he works hard to support his family. He has a 'tricycle' transportation business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from fish vending. April is borrowing PHP 17,000 through NWTF in order to buy new tools and equipment for his tricycle.

April has been sustaining his business activities through his past 17 loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. April hopes that his hard work will help him attain his dream: to save enough to build a house for his family.

loans.use: to buy new tools and equipment for his 'tricycle'.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary lives in Malindi, Kenya.  She is widowed. Mary has four children who depend on her for upkeep; three of them attend school. For more than two years now she has been selling fish at the local market. This is what has been keeping the family. The business has been doing great and she recently started paying for the plot of land she intends to buy. She wants to build her own residential house in the next five years. 

The challenge in the business is customers not paying on time. She heard about Milango through friends and now seeks a loan to buy 100 kgs of lake fish. The income from the business will improve her living standards.

loans.use: to buy 100 kgs of lake fish.

loans.name: Sonia Patricia

texts.es: La cliente reside en la zona de Fortín en Guayaquil.  Elaboraba empanadas para los vecinos, pero luego sus ventas se fueron incrementando hasta que llegó también a distribuír en otros lados.  Trabaja en las tardes con sus hijas.  Es soltero y a futuro desea comprarse un vehículo que le ayude en las labores diarias.  Desea invertir el crédito en la compra de harina y pollo para la elaboración de las empanadas que comercializa a diario.
texts.en: This client lives in the Fortín zone in Guayaquil.  She used to make turnovers for the neighbors but as her sales grew she started to also distribute them in other places.  She works evenings with her daughters.  She’s single and in future would like to buy a car to help with her daily chores.  She wants to use the loan to buy flour and chicken to make the turnovers she sells daily.

loans.use: to buy flour and chicken.

loans.name: Maritza Monserrate

texts.es: La cliente reside en el sector de Fortín.  La necesidad la llevó a desempeñarse en esta actividad y además recibió el consejo y apoyo de sus vecinos.  Trabaja solo en su negocio, básicamente en el horario de la tarde.  No es casado pero tiene 2 hijos que van a la escuela fiscal.  A futuro tiene el deseo de comprarse un vehículo.  Ahora necesita el crédito para abastecerse con cortes de tela para su negocio.
